ygData.subject: Re: New changes.
ygData.msgSnippet: it is actually procing weapons, not piercing.  don t know what procing actually means but it refers to weapons that cast a spell.  so bards with polished
ygData.messageBody:
it is actually procing weapons, not piercing. don't know what procing
actually means but it refers to weapons that cast a spell. so bards with
polished granite tomahawks and staffs of writhing will be quite happy.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: David Lendrum [mailto:Karnek@...]
Sent: Friday, June 04, 1999 12:36 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] New changes.


- Pircing weapons no longer break Bard's singing.
- Certain Bard spells will now require the use of Mana if noted.

The only bard related changes i saw this was up on eqv..now we gotta use
mana to SING? sheesh lets try to make bards a totally useless class. =(

Karnek D'Jester L24 Bard Erollisi Marr Server.
